item.title: Making npcs hit harder?
item.dc:creator: @pkpoison pkpoison
item.description:
@pkpoison wrote:

[quote=“jamessemple, post:4, topic:304882”][quote author=TimmahPwnz link=topic=401152.msg2973542#msg2973542 date=1254089951]
More HP More Damage, I Think, May Aswel Try It, Or Change Level To A Higher One? Like Lvl 12 To Lvl 1337
[/quote] This is Not correct.
What you need to do is this: Open up Npc Handler and search for this:
} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType ==
After searching for that you should get something that looks similar to this:
} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1158) {
npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2851; //KQ Attack
hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(12);
It May not have the bottom line on there and it will probably have like a rat or chicken or something.
If you want an npc to deal damage add that bottom line and where it says npcType == put in the Id there. The one i put up is the kalphite queen. to change what the npc hits you have your hitDiff = 0 + By having it set to this it means that the kalphite queen’s minimum hit on you will be on you is a 0 and the misc.random is the max hit it will deal and by setting those 2 numbers the misc.random will randomise hits between those to numbers and the actual numbers themselves.
Hope this helped

—James—[/quote]

Thanks Rep++

Read full topic

item.title: Making npcs hit harder?
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

[quote=“TimmahPwnz, post:2, topic:304882”]More HP More Damage, I Think, May Aswel Try It, Or Change Level To A Higher One? Like Lvl 12 To Lvl 1337[/quote] This is Not correct.
What you need to do is this: Open up Npc Handler and search for this:
} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType ==
After searching for that you should get something that looks similar to this:
} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1158) {
npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2851; //KQ Attack
hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(12);
It May not have the bottom line on there and it will probably have like a rat or chicken or something.
If you want an npc to deal damage add that bottom line and where it says npcType == put in the Id there. The one i put up is the kalphite queen. to change what the npc hits you have your hitDiff = 0 + By having it set to this it means that the kalphite queen’s minimum hit on you will be on you is a 0 and the misc.random is the max hit it will deal and by setting those 2 numbers the misc.random will randomise hits between those to numbers and the actual numbers themselves.
Hope this helped

—James—
